text: Prakash Shah is an Indian diplomat. He has been Permanent Representative of India to the United Nations from February 1995 to July 1997. In August 1998, he was also appointed by Kofi Annan as special envoy to Baghdad during the arms conflict in Iraq. From 1997 to 1980, he also served as Joint Secretary to Prime Minister of India; Morarji Desai, Charan Singh and Indira Gandhi. == References == Category:Permanent Representatives of India to the United Nations Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Indian diplomats Category:Living people
title: Prakash Shah
